subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Olympic Games (2012)
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: The players’ association will oppose an expedited schedule in the case, and contended that the federation’s 2015 financial statement had conceded the key point in the lawsuit.
snippet: The players’ association will oppose an expedited schedule in the case, and contended that the federation’s 2015 financial statement had conceded the key point in the lawsuit.
